Adventure.name: Ridiculous Challenge
Adventure.nodes:
You receive a mysterious letter:
'You have defeated the great Gosk, or you were wise enough not to do so.
Either way, you have achieved your peak as chosen. But, if you wish to face some more outrageous challenges, come find the Sea Mirrors. Within those magical pockets, you will discover the echoes of great enemies, summoned for one purpose only - to fight.
Yours truly, the maker...'

Adventure.name: AegJur1
Adventure.nodes: You arrive at one of the Sea Mirrors and you see before you several water portals. On the other side, you see the echoes of epic enemies waiting to fight you.
You defeated the epic enemy.
You were defeated and forced to flee.

Adventure.name: AegJur2
Adventure.nodes: You arrive at one of the Sea Mirrors and you see before you several water portals. On the other side, you see the echoes of epic enemies waiting to fight you.
You defeated the epic enemy.
You were defeated and forced to flee.

You were defeated and forced to flee.

Adventure.name: Chieftain training
Adventure.nodes: Você é abordado por um chefe goblin idoso: 'Ah, meu jovem amigo, ouvi falar muito bem de você. Estou à beira da travessia do meu espírito e, infelizmente, minha própria aldeia se foi há muito tempo. E assim, decidi confiar meu conhecimento espiritual a você!'

'Yes, yes, of course it is!
Now, you will have to pay me - I have debts and will not go into the grey world in shame.
Then you have to show me you are good enough, chieftain is a sacred role, entrusted only to one, and one who guides their village. I am braking this law, because your gods proved to me that they deserve it. But, you must also show me.
I will accept a candidate who shows their strengths in mind, spirit or body. You pay first, and I do not give money back...'
[Only one character per game will be allowed this change]
'Good, good, now my spirit will leave my body and test you in a challenge of your choice. A chieftain must be master in something, you know...'

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own soul.
'I am sorry, but you are not worthy. I will stay here a while, so you may return and try again.'

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own.

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own.

Adventure.name: Mirror Champion
Adventure.nodes: 'Bem, olá. Eu estava observando seu progresso, como faço, e devo dizer que você é especial, hein? Parabéns por se tornar o Campeão dos Espelhos do Mar, isso não é pouca coisa. Eu te daria uma recompensa ou algo assim, mas acho que não tenho nada que você precise agora, então parabéns querido escolhido!'

Adventure.name: Ice Ruins 4
Adventure.nodes: You find the frozen ruins of some old structure.
Você encontra uma sala cheia de pedras preciosas. Mas assim que você entra, você é atacado por sniezynki. Seus olhos brilham vermelhos e eles parecem enlouquecidos.
You defeat the sniezynki and realise the gemstones were an illusion. But, you do discover this room was once made with some good metal, so you are able to salvage some of it.
You were badly beaten, cursed and forced to flee.

Você libera os sniezynki de sua maldição e eles fogem, com medo deste lugar. Eles te deixam um presente em agradecimento. Você percebe que as pedras preciosas eram uma ilusão. Mas, você descobre que esta sala já foi feita com um bom metal, então você pode salvar um pouco dele.

Enquanto você procura pelas ruínas, você vê um baú do tesouro. Mas, você vê a sala em que o baú está prestes a desabar sobre si mesmo, e você percebe que vários pingentes de gelo estão se agarrando à coisa também. Você não tem tempo para chegar até eles ou ao baú, mas, se você conseguir convencer os pequenos trolls a virem até você, eles podem sair.
The icicles listen to you and run out of the room before it collapses. They abandon the chest at your feet and scuttle away.
They did not listen and the room collapsed.
The ruins seem haunted. If you wish to loot anything, you will have to face the wraiths.
You defeat the wraiths.
Your search turns up a few things.

Adventure.name: ARENA
Adventure.nodes:
You receive an invitation:
'Hear ye, hear ye! If ye be a mighty warrior, a steadfast thinker or a master magician, come test your mantle upon the grounds of the ancient Arena.'
You have the coordinates.

Adventure.name: ARENA2
Adventure.nodes:
You arrive at the Lighting Dome - the first of the great arena's. The place is run by an old pirate:
'Arr, you be new blood eh? Rules are simple, ye go in and ye fight each round without a break! There are five fights. If ye lose, ye start over from the start and lose some goods as payment. All aboard mateys?'
'Aqui está seu inimigo. Escolha seu estilo e lute bem. Além disso, esta é sua última chance de recuar, depois desta, você ganha ou perde.'
'Arr, você é um bom esportista, mas você não é campeão, ainda... Tire suas pontas da minha areia e volte quando estiver bem!'
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!

'Land lovers and sea scallions alike, here be our new champions!
Now, ye did well mateys, but, if ye really want to be called victorious, ye go visit the Dome of Thunder. There ye be faced with some real foes.
Now, let us drink and party, champions!'

'Land lovers and sea scallions alike, here be our new champions!
Now, ye did well mateys, but, if ye really want to be called victorious, ye go visit the Dome of Thunder. There ye be faced with some real foes.
Now, let us drink and party, champions!'

Adventure.name: ARENA3
Adventure.nodes:
Oddly enough, the same old pirate welcomes you:
'Arr, you be the little champions, eh? Rules are simple, ye go in and ye fight each round without a break! There are five fights. If ye lose, ye start over from the start and lose some goods as payment. All aboard mateys?'
'Aqui está seu inimigo. Escolha seu estilo e lute bem. Além disso, esta é sua última chance de recuar, depois desta, você ganha ou perde.'
'Arr, você é um bom esportista, mas você não é campeão, ainda... Tire suas pontas da minha areia e volte quando estiver bem!'
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
The crowds cheer and your next opponent lines up!
'Amantes da terra e cebolinhas do mar, aqui estão nossos novos grandes campeões da Cúpula do Trovão! Agora, vamos beber e festejar.
'Amantes da terra e cebolinhas do mar, aqui estão nossos novos grandes campeões da Cúpula do Trovão! Agora, vamos beber e festejar.

Adventure.name: Chieftain training spwn
Adventure.nodes: Você encontra o velho chefe novamente: 'Ah, você está de volta, que bom. Aguardo para passar meu espírito para você.'

'Yes, yes, of course it is!
Now, you will have to pay me - I have debts and will not go into the grey world in shame.
Then you have to show me you are good enough, chieftain is a sacred role, entrusted only to one, and one who guides their village. I am braking this law, because your gods proved to me that they deserve it. But, you must also show me.
I will accept a candidate who shows their strengths in mind, spirit or body. You pay first, and I do not give money back...'
[Only one character per game will be allowed this change]
'Good, good, now my spirit will leave my body and test you in a challenge of your choice. A chieftain must be master in something, you know...'

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own.
' I am sorry, but you are not worthy. I will stay here a while, so you may return and try again.'

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own.

'Yes, yes, you are good, or good enough. I go now to the grey world, but part of my spirit will join with yours as is our tradition.
You may experience changes, my soul is strong, it may overpower yours.'
The old man chuckles as he falls to the ground and dies in front of you. You feel his spirit enter your body and merge with your own.

Adventure.name: Ice Ruins 8
Adventure.nodes: You find the frozen ruins of some old structure.

Enquanto você procura, você encontra uma câmara onde um dziad mroz parece estar preso. Seus olhos tipicamente frios parecem ainda mais vazios do que o normal e assim que você se aproxima, ele ataca você.
You defeat the dziad mroz and you are free to explore the ruins.
You were badly beaten, cursed and forced to flee.
You release the dziad mroz from his curse, but he melts away as soon as the dark spell leaves his body. It seems he was dead all along.

Enquanto você procura pelas ruínas, você vê uma sala cheia de tesouros. Mas, parece que um troll do gelo mora lá também. Você sabe que os trolls gostam de comida, você pode tentar convencê-lo a lhe dar algum tesouro por comida.
The troll agrees to the deal. It takes some of your food and hands over some treasure.
They did not listen and the room collapsed.
There are unliving dragons in these ruins.
You defeated the dragons.
Your search turns up a few things.
You defeat the enemy.
